Description:
We are looking for motivated, talented fresh graduate engineers for different internship opportunities with Acuative.Participate in a structured training program aimed at developing your technical and professional skills.
Collaborate with senior engineers and project teams to contribute to ongoing projects, research, and development initiatives.
Learn and apply engineering principles, concepts, and techniques to solve practical problems and address challenges.
Assist in the design, testing, and prototyping of products or systems under the guidance of experienced engineers.
Conduct research and gather data to support engineering analyses and decision-making processes.
Participate in workshops, seminars, and technical training sessions to enhance your knowledge in specific engineering domains.
Document your work, including project plans, reports, and technical documentation.
Embrace opportunities for learning and growth, and actively seek guidance and mentorship from experienced colleagues.Skills
Skills: Bachelor's degree in one of the following:

Computer Science
Information Technology
Computer Programming
Telecom Engineering
Software Engineering
Computer Engineering
Network Engineering
Cyber Security Engineering
